TITLE: Episode 36 - The Party of Lincoln [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: This week, we get an Iran update from our personal foreign policy news hound, Matt Nichols, and we talk about the LP, what we think of it, and if it is remotely worth saving. Spoiler alert: It's not.
